text: Markaas labadii gabdhood middood baa u timid iyadoo u soconaysa si xishood leh oo tidhi: Aabbahay baa kuu yeedhaya si uu kuu siiyo abaalgudka waraabintii dar- teed aad noo waraabisay (xoolahayaga). Oo markuu u yimid8 oo uga warramay qisa- dii dhacday, wuxuu yidhi: Ha cabsan. Waad ka badbaadday dadkaa daalimiinta ah
